an3.36:5.4: Taṁ kho pana te etaṁ → taṁ kho panetaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | pāpakammaṁ → pāpaṁ kammaṁ (bj)
an3.36:15.4: (…) → (so tattha pheṇuddehakaṁ paccati) (bj); (so tattha phenuddehakaṁ paccati) (sya-all)
an3.36:22.1: appamattā → te khoppattā (bj); te khemappattā (sya-all, km, pts1ed) | sukhino → sukhitā (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
